dt: sometimes used in combination especially by those who prefer to avoid {it}man{/it} in compounds applicable to both sexes
{bc}a character or part in or as if in a play {bc}{sx|guise||}
{bc}one of the three modes of being in the Trinitarian Godhead as understood by Christians
{bc}the unitary {a_link|personality} of Christ that unites the divine and human natures
{bc}one (such as a human being, a partnership, or a corporation) that is recognized by law as the subject of rights and duties
{bc}reference of a segment of discourse to the speaker, to one spoken to, or to one spoken of as indicated by means of certain pronouns or in many languages by verb inflection

et: Middle English, from Anglo-French {it}persone{/it}, from Latin {it}persona{/it} actor's mask, character in a play, person, probably from Etruscan {it}phersu{/it} mask, from Greek {it}prosōpa{/it}, plural of {it}prosōpon{/it} face, mask {ma}{mat|prosopopoeia|}{/ma}
shortdef: human, individual —sometimes used in combination especially by those who prefer to avoid man in compounds applicable to both sexes
a character or part in or as if in a play : guise
one of the three modes of being in the Trinitarian Godhead as understood by Christians

dt: {bc}a person whose skin {d_link|pigmentation|pigmentation} is other than and especially darker than what is considered characteristic of people typically defined as white {dx_def}see {dxt|white:1||2a}{/dx_def} {bc}a person who is of a race {dx_def}see {dxt|race:1||1a}{/dx_def} other than white or who is of mixed race

dt.t: {wi}People of color{/wi} account for 43 percent of the active-duty military, but the top ranks are largely white and male.
Because we are so accustomed to talking about race in terms of black and white, we often fail to recognize and contest expressions of racism that target {wi}people of color{/wi} who are not black.

shortdef: a person whose skin pigmentation is other than and especially darker than what is considered characteristic of people typically defined as white : a person who is of a race other than white or who is of mixed race

dt: {bc}a unit of one hour's work by one person

shortdef: a unit of one hour's work by one person

dt: {bc}a person who is believed to be possibly involved in a crime but has not been charged or arrested

shortdef: a person who is believed to be possibly involved in a crime but has not been charged or arrested

dt: {bc}involving two people or going directly from one person to another person

dt.t: The reporter talked {it}person-to-person{/it} with the hostage.

shortdef: involving two people or going directly from one person to another person

dt: {bc}experienced as if through the eyes of an {d_link|avatar|avatar} (as in a video game)

dt.t: A {wi}first-person{/wi} {d_link|shooter|shooter} is a game in which you, the player, carry a weapon into some sort of video game conflict.
When playing as the lead guitarist in {wi}first person{/wi} mode players will see fans react to how they play.

shortdef: experienced as if through the eyes of an avatar (as in a video game)

dt: {bc}a set of linguistic forms (such as verb forms, pronouns, and inflectional affixes) referring to the speaker or writer of the utterance in which they occur
{bc}a linguistic form belonging to such a set
{bc}reference of a linguistic form to the speaker or writer of the utterance in which it occurs
{bc}a style of discourse marked by general use of verbs and pronouns of the first person

shortdef: a set of linguistic forms (such as verb forms, pronouns, and inflectional affixes) referring to the speaker or writer of the utterance in which they occur
a linguistic form belonging to such a set
reference of a linguistic form to the speaker or writer of the utterance in which it occurs

dt: {bc}a person of unusually short stature and especially a person affected with {d_link|dwarfism|dwarfism}

dt.t: For over five years, Sinéad has toured both primary and secondary schools around the country speaking with large groups about living life as a {wi}little person{/wi} …
After his release, he became an actor, finding roles written for {wi}little people{/wi}.

shortdef: a person of unusually short stature and especially a person affected with dwarfism

dt: {bc}a person (such as a principal spokesperson or advocate) who is in the forefront {bc}{sx|point man||2}

shortdef: a person (such as a principal spokesperson or advocate) who is in the forefront : point man
